hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: DamDoh's Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveys.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

fis.title: Financial Institutions
fis.description: Provide targeted loans, grants, and insurance products to a verified network of agricultural businesses.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Or recover access with your Universal ID
Auth.signUpDescription: Tell us a bit about yourself to get started.
Auth.namePlaceholder: e.g., Chan Nary or Green Valley Farms
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your role in the supply chain...
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No problem. Enter your email address below, and we'll send you a link to reset it.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter and confirm your new password below.

recoverPage.title: Recover Your Account
recoverPage.description: Use your network to regain access.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Once your friend scans the code to verify your identity, you'll regain access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh contact scan this QR code using the 'Help a Friend Recover' feature in their app.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and expires in 10 minutes.

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: A password reset link has been sent to {email}.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescriptionIfAccountExists: If an account with {email} exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the password reset link.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

resetPassword.successDescription: You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.successRedirect: You will be redirected to the sign-in page shortly.

errors.missingCode: Invalid password reset link. Please request a new one.
errors.missingCodeDescription: The password reset link is missing or invalid. Please return to the 'Forgot Password' page to request a new one.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidOrExpiredCode: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.userDisabled: This user account has been disabled.
errors.userNotFound: No user found corresponding to this reset link.
errors.weakPassword: The new password is not strong enough.

errors.emailInUse: This email is already in use.
errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters.

signUpSuccess.title: Account Created & Signed In!
signUpSuccess.description: Welcome to {appName}! You have been successfully signed in.

loggedOut.title: Logged Out
loggedOut.description: You have been successfully logged out.

logoutFailed.title: Logout Failed
logoutFailed.description: Could not log you out. Please try again.

AppFooter.tagline: The global platform for the agricultural supply chain.

pro.unlock: Unlock more insights with DamDoh Pro.

feedError.title: Error Loading Feed
feedError.description: Could not retrieve the latest activity. Please check your connection.

postError.auth: You must be signed in to post.
postError.fail: Failed to create post. Please try again.

postSuccess.title: Post Created!
postSuccess.description: Your update has been shared with the network.

likeError.auth: You must sign in to like a post.
likeError.fail: Could not like post. Please try again.

commentError.auth: You must be signed in to comment.

deleteError.auth: You must be signed in to delete a post.

deleteSuccess.title: Post Deleted
deleteSuccess.description: Your post has been successfully removed.

MainDashboard.noActivity: No recent activity in your network. Start a conversation or explore the marketplace!

DashboardRightSidebar.infoTooltip: Suggestions are based on your profile interests and needs.
DashboardRightSidebar.noSuggestions: No new suggestions right now. Check back later!
DashboardRightSidebar.promotionsDescription: See special offers and deals from partners in the ecosystem.
DashboardRightSidebar.adDescription: Get real-time data and analytics with DamDoh Pro.

MobileHomepage.noRecommendations: Nothing to show right now. Explore the marketplace!
MobileHomepage.communityFeedDescription: What's happening in your network? Jump into the main feed to see posts, news, and updates.

FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: You must be signed in to like a post.
FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: You must be signed in to vote.

CreatePostModal.title: Create a new post
CreatePostModal.description: Share an update, ask a question, or start a conversation with the community.
CreatePostModal.pollNote: A maximum of {maxOptions} options are allowed.
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: A poll must have at least 2 non-empty options.

CropRotationSuggester.title: AI Crop Rotation Suggester
CropRotationSuggester.description: Get AI-powered suggestions for your next crop to improve soil health and break pest cycles.
CropRotationSuggester.error: Could not get a suggestion at this time. Please try again.
CropRotationSuggester.noSuggestions: The AI could not generate a specific suggestion based on the history provided.

page.couldNotFetchEvents: Could not fetch the list of events at this time.
page.title: Agricultural Events
page.description: Find and join conferences, workshops, and webinars in the agricultural sector.
page.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, location, or description...
page.noEventsHint: Try adjusting your search filters, or {link} to announce it to the community.

unpinned.title: Homepage Unpinned
unpinned.description: The default dashboard will now be your homepage.

pinned.title: Homepage Pinned
pinned.description: Agri-Events is now your default homepage.

blogPage.title: DamDoh Blog & News
blogPage.description: The latest insights, stories, and updates from the agricultural world.

noPosts.title: Nothing new to see here... yet!
noPosts.description: Check back soon for new articles and industry news.

notFound.title: Post Not Found
notFound.description: The article you are looking for does not exist.

errors.title: Error
errors.load: Could not load the blog post.

pinboardPage.title: Pin-Board
pinboardPage.description: Your personal space to save important items from across DamDoh.
pinboardPage.comingSoonDescription: This feature will allow you to 'pin' marketplace items, forum posts, profiles, and more to a personal board for easy access.

walletPage.title: My Wallet
walletPage.description: Manage your finances, view transactions, and access financial services.
walletPage.underDevelopmentDescription: We are building a robust and secure digital wallet to manage all your platform transactions. Features will include:
walletPage.feature2: Transaction history for marketplace sales and service payments.
walletPage.feature3: Easy payouts to your local mobile money or bank account.
walletPage.feature4: Access to apply for loans and grants directly from your wallet.
walletPage.stayTuned: Stay tuned for this exciting feature!

industryNewsPage.title: Industry News
industryNewsPage.description: Stay informed with the latest trends, research, and policy changes in agriculture.

news1.title: Global Coffee Prices Surge Amidst Brazil Frosts and Shipping Delays
news1.excerpt: A combination of adverse weather in key growing regions and ongoing global logistics challenges has pushed Arabica coffee futures to a seven-year high...

news2.title: EU Implements New 'Farm to Fork' Strategy Regulations on Packaging
news2.excerpt: New regulations will require food exporters to the EU to meet stricter standards for recyclable and compostable packaging, affecting the entire supply chain.

news3.title: Study Shows Regenerative Practices Can Increase Soil Carbon by 15% in 5 Years
news3.excerpt: A long-term study published in Nature demonstrates the significant potential of no-till and cover cropping practices for carbon sequestration and soil health.

noNews.title: No News Found
noNews.description: There are no news articles matching your criteria at this time.

layout.title: Admin Panel
layout.description: This is a restricted area. Manage platform content and settings.

dashboard.title: Welcome to the Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Select a module from the sidebar to begin managing the platform.
dashboard.content: From here you can create and manage knowledge articles, courses, and other platform content.

allArticles.title: All Knowledge Articles
allArticles.description: View, edit, and manage all articles on the platform.

table.title: Title
table.noArticles: No articles have been created yet.

createArticle.title: Create New Article
createArticle.description: Write a new blog post, news update, or knowledge base entry.
createArticle.categoryPlaceholder: e.g., Blog, Industry News, KNF Guide

toast.loadErrorDescription: Could not retrieve the list of articles.
toast.createSuccessDescription: The new article has been published successfully.

generate.title: Generate Regulatory Report
generate.description: Create on-demand reports for specific users and time periods.

list.title: Generated Reports
list.description: View and download previously generated reports.
list.noReports: No reports have been generated yet.

toast.formIncompleteDescription: Please select a report type, target user, and date range.
toast.generateSuccessDescription: The report is being created in the background and will appear below.

pinboardPage.description: Your personal space to save important items from across DamDoh.
pinboardPage.comingSoonDescription: This feature will allow you to 'pin' marketplace items, forum posts, profiles, and more to a personal board for easy access.

walletPage.description: Manage your finances, view transactions, and access financial services.
walletPage.underDevelopmentDescription: We are building a robust and secure digital wallet to manage all your platform transactions. Features will include:

walletPage.feature3: Easy payouts to your local mobile money or bank account.
walletPage.feature4: Access to apply for loans and grants directly from your wallet.

notificationsPage.title: Notifications
notificationsPage.description: Stay up to date with the latest activity from your network.
notificationsPage.placedNewOrder: {name} placed an order for your listing.

messagingPage.title: Messages
messagingPage.noConversations: You have no conversations yet. Start one by connecting with someone on the Network page.
messagingPage.selectConversation: Select a conversation to start chatting.
messagingPage.noMessages: No messages in this conversation yet. Be the first to say something!
messagingPage.signInToView: Please sign in to view your messages.
messagingPage.couldNotStartConversation: Could not start a new conversation.

networkPage.title: My Supply Chain Network
networkPage.description: Discover and connect with stakeholders across the agricultural supply chain.
networkPage.aiSuggestionsDescription: Connect with people you may know based on your profile and activity.
networkPage.noSuggestions: No new suggestions right now. Check back later!
networkPage.browseAllDescription: Find and connect with new partners in the supply chain.
networkPage.invitePrompt: Enter the email address of the person you want to invite:

myNetworkPage.connectionsDescription: Your established network of partners and contacts.

noConnections.title: Your Network is Empty
